input_email_body:
Subject: 

Hello Customer Support, I am facing issues with the battery life of my MacBook Air M1. It appears to deplete too quickly even with minimal usage. This situation is greatly affecting my efficiency. I made my purchase recently and I hope it's within the warranty period My name is Maria Gonzalez.. Can you please let me know if this issue can be resolved quickly? My account number is <acc_num>. You can contact me at <tel_num>. Thank you for your prompt response. Sincerely, <name> You can reach me at janesmith@company.com.
